title: Classic Pour-Over Coffee
desc: A clean and crisp cup of coffee using the pour-over method
instructions: Rinse paper filter with hot water and discard water.
Add ground coffee to filter.
Pour 50ml water for blooming and wait 30 seconds.
Slowly pour the remaining water in a circular motion.
Let the coffee drip completely and serve.

title: Espresso Macchiato
desc: A rich and bold espresso shot with a dollop of steamed milk
instructions: Grind coffee beans finely and tamp them into the portafilter.
Lock the portafilter into the espresso machine and start extraction.
Pull a 30ml espresso shot.
Steam a small amount of milk until foamy.
Spoon a dollop of steamed milk on top of the espresso and serve.

title: Cold Brew Coffee
desc: A smooth and refreshing coffee brewed with cold water
instructions: Add ground coffee to a jar or cold brew maker.
Pour cold water over the coffee and stir gently.
Cover and let it steep in the fridge for 12-24 hours.
Strain the coffee using a fine mesh or filter.
Serve over ice and dilute with water or milk if desired.

title: Aeropress Coffee
desc: A full-bodied cup of coffee using the Aeropress method
instructions: Insert a filter into the Aeropress cap and rinse with hot water.
Add ground coffee to the Aeropress.
Pour half of the hot water, stir, and let bloom for 30 seconds.
Add the rest of the water and stir again.
Insert the plunger and press down slowly to extract coffee.

title: French Press Coffee
desc: A rich and bold cup of coffee using the French Press method
instructions: Add ground coffee to the French Press.
Pour half of the hot water, stir, and let it bloom for 30 seconds.
Add the rest of the water and cover with the lid.
Let it steep for 4 minutes.
Press the plunger down slowly and serve.

title: Moka Pot Coffee
desc: A strong and flavorful cup of coffee using the Moka Pot method
instructions: Fill the bottom chamber of the Moka Pot with water up to the safety valve.
Place finely ground coffee into the filter basket and level it.
Assemble the Moka Pot and place it on medium heat.
Wait for the coffee to brew and fill the upper chamber.
Remove from heat, stir, and serve immediately.

title: Traditional Turkish Coffee
desc: A rich and strong coffee brewed in a cezve with fine grounds
instructions: Add coffee, water, and sugar (if desired) to a cezve.
Stir well before heating.
Heat slowly over low heat until foam starts forming.
Before boiling, remove from heat and pour foam into cups.
Return to heat, let it foam again, then pour the remaining coffee into cups.

title: Classic Drip Coffee
desc: A smooth and balanced coffee brewed using a drip machine
instructions: Add ground coffee to the drip machine's filter.
Fill the water reservoir with filtered water.
Start the brewing process.
Once brewed, serve immediately.

title: Vanilla Cold Brew
desc: A sweet and creamy cold brew infused with vanilla
ingredients: 1 vanilla bean or 1 tsp vanilla extract
instructions: Add ground coffee and vanilla to a jar or cold brew maker.
Pour cold water over the coffee and stir gently.
Cover and let it steep in the fridge for 16-24 hours.
Strain the coffee using a fine mesh or filter.
Serve over ice and enjoy.

title: Flat White
desc: A creamy and smooth espresso-based drink with steamed milk
instructions: Brew a single or double shot of espresso.
Steam milk to create a smooth microfoam texture.
Gently pour the milk over the espresso.
Ensure a balance between coffee strength and milk texture.

title: Vietnamese Egg Coffee
desc: A unique coffee topped with a creamy egg mixture
instructions: Brew strong coffee using a Vietnamese drip filter.
In a bowl, whisk egg yolk and condensed milk until creamy.
Pour the brewed coffee into a cup.
Top with the egg mixture and serve.

title: Hario V60 Pour-Over
desc: A bright and aromatic pour-over coffee using the Hario V60
instructions: Rinse the Hario V60 filter with hot water and discard water.
Add ground coffee to the filter.
Pour 50ml water for blooming and wait 30 seconds.
Slowly pour the remaining water in a circular motion.
Let the coffee drip completely and serve.

title: Cortado
desc: A balanced espresso drink with equal parts steamed milk
instructions: Brew a single shot of espresso.
Steam milk until warm and slightly frothy.
Pour the steamed milk over the espresso.
Serve immediately.

title: Affogato
desc: A delicious dessert coffee with espresso poured over ice cream
instructions: Scoop vanilla ice cream into a small cup or bowl.
Brew a fresh shot of espresso.
Pour the hot espresso over the ice cream.
Enjoy immediately as the ice cream melts.

title: French Press Dark Roast
desc: A bold and deep-flavored French Press coffee
instructions: Add ground coffee to the French Press.
Pour half of the hot water, stir, and let it bloom for 30 seconds.
Add the rest of the water and cover with the lid.
Let it steep for 4 minutes.
Press the plunger down slowly and serve.

Assemble the Moka Pot and place it on medium heat.

title: Chocolate Cold Brew
desc: A chocolate-infused cold brew coffee for a sweet twist

Cover and let it steep in the fridge for 12-24 hours.
Strain the coffee using a fine mesh or filter.

title: Café Latte
desc: A classic latte with steamed milk and espresso
instructions: Brew a single shot of espresso.
Steam milk until warm and slightly frothy.
Pour the steamed milk over the espresso.
Serve immediately.

title: Aeropress Iced Coffee
desc: A refreshing iced coffee brewed with the Aeropress
instructions: Insert a filter into the Aeropress cap and rinse with cold water.
Add ground coffee to the Aeropress.
Pour half of the cold water, stir, and let bloom for 30 seconds.
Add the rest of the water and stir again.
Insert the plunger and press down slowly to extract coffee over ice.

Return to heat, let it foam again, then pour the remaining coffee into cups.
